column5: I'm sitting in emerg in dryden and noticed the wall of hookups this year is pretty full. Any of you on here? Anybody have any bad hook up stories from this season?

LOL....nope....I refused to go on the 'Wall of Shame' despite a nice hook up while trying to lip hold a spring bass this year, plus the bite was on so did not want to leave. Just got my pliers and ripped it out, hurt like stink but hey, now I know how the fish feel....lol. Here is the video of my hook up.https://youtu.be/VRc-Dw5IjJA
Luckily I'm not on the wall of hook ups. Hurts to look at it.
Hopefully your are there because that is where you work. PjShorthorn
I had to take down my wall of hook-ups when I got married.
Not on the wall but did have to haul in a friend last year to Dryden from McClain Narrows. He wound up with a pacemaker!! He was back with us this year.
The wall off hook ups............that's funny! (Since I'm not on it)
Close.butvrather than waste the day i ripped a muskie hook out.hurt like ****.but fished all day.lol.

Look at some of those hooks, some are so small .....I've seen mosquitos with more.......just kidding, never had the honor of hooking myself or partner (yet). Had a newbie with me a couple years ago and he was determined to cast for northerns, That BIG 2 trebel hook spinner wizzed by my ear WAY to many times, so I took cover and watched him.
I stitched a dude once after removing a hookup.
